subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Florian Thauvin scored twice to give France a win against Ghana and a spot in the Under-20 World Cup final against Uruguay, which beat Iraq on penalties after a 1-1 draw.
snippet: Florian Thauvin scored twice to give France a win against Ghana and a spot in the Under-20 World Cup final against Uruguay, which beat Iraq on penalties after a 1-1 draw.
